creator: glenn@apache.org
text:
Building the jakarta-servletapi-4 Servlet 2.3 and JSP 1.2 javadocs using
java 1.4 generates alot of new javadoc errors.

creator: medthomas@ntlworld.com
text:
Created attachment 9546
Patch to fix javadoc errors

The tomcat team can't actually fix this. See

http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?t=107168404800001&r=1&w=2

for an explanation of why. I am resolving this as REMIND so we can follow it 
up later.
creator: medthomas@ntlworld.com
